About Brawlhalla:
Brawlhalla is a 2D platform fighter and Free-to-Play on PC, Mac, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Mobile devices.

It offers intense, competitive online play and engaging offline modes to allow players to fully customize their fight experience. The game has a thriving esports scene and is regularly updated. Each Legend in Brawlhalla has an exciting backstory and uses a unique weapon combination and signature attacks to defeat their fellow contenders. 

Join the fight now!

#Ubisoft #brawlhallamoments
